definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Jacob wagered his donkey, he did not bet his ass.
sentences.chinese: 雅各布擔保了他的驢子，他並沒有打賭他的屁股。

sentences.english: "What about me?" brayed the donkey. "I thought I was the cleverest. "
sentences.chinese: “那我呢？”驢子叫道，“我覺得我纔是最聰明的。”

sentences.english: Jest with an ass and he will flap you in the face with his tail.
sentences.chinese: 你跟驢子開玩笑，將被驢尾打耳光。

sentences.english: In the United States, there are breeders who raise and sell burros .
sentences.chinese: 在美國，有飼養並販賣驢子的飼養員。

sentences.english: Yin recited sutras for the dead donkey's soul, and performed ceremonies to release it from its suffering.
sentences.chinese: 殷爲驢子的靈魂唸經，還做法事減輕它的痛苦。

sentences.english: If two call you a donkey, check for hoof prints.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人叫你驢子，檢查一下蹄印。

sentences.english: Long, long ago, a donkey fell in a dry well .
sentences.chinese: 很久很久以前，一頭驢子掉到了一個枯井裏。

sentences.english: He lifted his voice and brayed , but then everyone knew him.
sentences.chinese: 它揚着嗓子叫了起來，但每個人都知道了是驢子。

sentences.english: Just then the Mullah heard the sound of his donkey's feet.
sentences.chinese: 就在那時，毛拉聽到驢子的蹄聲。

sentences.english: The braying of an ass does not reach heaven.
sentences.chinese: 驢子叫聲雖響，但也傳不到天上。

sentences.english: He determined to leave his asses to save himself.
sentences.chinese: 他決定留下他的驢子來救自己的命。

sentences.english: The old man and his ass jogged along to the fair.
sentences.chinese: 老人和驢子連跑帶顛地向市場行進。

sentences.english: Burros like to clean each other.
One day a farmer’s donkey fell into an abandoned well.
sentences.chinese: 一日，農夫的驢子掉進了一口枯井裏。

sentences.english: The donkey moved firmly forward on the mountain trail, the bell ringing rhythmically .
sentences.chinese: 驢子穩步走在山道上，鈴聲叮噹，頗有節奏。
是一頭十分悲觀的驢子。
